Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/103rd
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Torrence, 100th and Commercial : due to, street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Torrence, 100th, Commercial and over regular route, due to street blockage near Commercial/103rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #4 Cottage Grove and #115 Pullman/115th  Reroute at Cottage Grove/95th
ShortDescription: #4 Cottage Grove and #115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted near Cottage Grove/95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#4 Cottage Grove and #115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cottage Grove, 95th, King Drive, 103rd, Cottage Grove, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/95th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Eastbound #95 95th Reroute near Cottage Grove/95th
ShortDescription: Eastbound 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted near Cottage Grove/95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, King Drive, 103rd, Cottage Grove, and resume normal route: due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/95th.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier medical emergency on the Red Line at Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier medical emergency on the Red Line at Lake.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Shuttle buses will are available to provide connecting service between Grand and Lake in both directions until 0700 hours.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Trains bypassing Lake
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Lake due to a medical emergency.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Lake due to a medical emergency.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Northbound Reroute near Stony Island/70th
ShortDescription: Northbound 28 Stony Island buses are temp. rerouted via Stony Island, 70th, Dorchester, 67th and Stony Island: due to, police activity near Stony Island/70th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

Northbound #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 70th, Dorchester, 67th, Stony Island and over regular route: due to, police activity near Stony Island/70th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
